author: jdillon
msg: Added more log detail about the verify timeout
Time the startup of the server

author: rooneg
msg: Fix ABDERA-43, add build glue for the i18n component.
I added a dependency on geronimo-activation_1.0.2_spec to the i18n pom so
it would build and tweaked the whitespace and comments in the new build.xml,
other than that this is Adam's contribution.
* pom.xml: Add the i18n module to the build.

author: andyhot
msg: Support adding status messages to an XHR response. No changes yet to the ResponseBuilder interface, you'll have to cast to DojoAjaxResponseBuilder to use this for now

author: andyhot
msg: Support a 'status' type - default behavior is to publish the message to the specified topic (think toaster amongst others)

author: markt
msg: Fix some logging related memory leaks. This fixes 41272 and the root cause of 41939.
